report.title: Report for trigger against Mammal Tracker hedgehog reported ill
report.description: Lists the most recent recordings for the Mammal Tracker survey where the Hedgehog Ill attribute has a value.
report.query: SELECT co.sample_id, co.taxon, co.date_start, co.public_entered_sref, co.location_name, o.comment, ctlt1.term AS hedgehogill, oav2.text_value AS hedgehogfreetext, co.website_id FROM cache_occurrences co JOIN occurrences o ON o.id = co.id JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav1 ON oav1.occurrence_id = co.id AND oav1.occurrence_attribute_id = 319 JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctlt1 ON ctlt1.id = oav1.int_value LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav2 ON oav2.occurrence_id = co.id AND oav2.occurrence_attribute_id = 336 WHERE co.survey_id = 183 AND o.created_on > '#date#' AND co.record_status NOT IN ('I','T') AND ctlt1.term != 'No' #order_by#
